title: IF I COULD ONLY CHOOSE ONE? BEST MACHINE FOR PROPERTY MAINTENANCE

tasks.task: Evaluate pros and cons of five farming machines (subcompact tractor, skid steer, compact tractor, utility tractor, and mini excavator) for a 140-acre property.
subtasks: Assess the capabilities of a John Deere 1025R subcompact tractor (small but versatile, can handle various tasks like tillage, mowing, trail maintenance).
Compare the power and stability of a John Deere 333G skid steer (high-flow hydraulic systems, excellent for heavy lifting and hilly terrain).
Analyze the benefits of a large compact tractor (hydrostatic transmission, high lift capacity, comfortable cab, suited for larger acreage).
Consider a Kubota M4D-071 utility tractor (good for setting and forgetting tasks like brush hogging and field mowing, less prone to overheating).
Evaluate a Caterpillar 305E2 mini excavator (versatile for specific projects like pond maintenance, steep bank clearing, but limited in overall applications).

tasks.task: Decide which machine to keep if having to choose one.
subtasks: Discuss the choice between the John Deere 4720 compact tractor (hydrostatic, comfortable cab, high lift capacity, suitable for property size) as the final selection.
